content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Process Asset Library (PAL) is available at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://pal.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"http://pal.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" from EPAM network only and contains approved standards, processes descriptions, guidelines, sample documents and templates for managing, developing and maintaining software applications, databases and documentation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some information about PAL is available at HD wiki:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/PAL.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/project/epm-help/KB/PAL.aspx\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To summarize, we use PAL to check whether there is and approved by QMS instruction on some process, e.g. Business Trip Handling, Access to email services, Vacation handling, Coding standards, etc. Instructions from PAL are available for all EPAM employees. On the Home page we can see navigation pane on the left with various sections describing info, which can be found on PAL:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/08a9e5e8-2409-4f50-9b85-e0346385dc1a/image2014-10-7%2011:35:56.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":206,\"height\":357.00000000000006}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If employee is inquiring about some document or in instruction or standard process description, first of all try looking for instruction on PAL.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
